      • getRandomRarityHigh

        protected static ModItemRarity getRandomRarityHigh()

        ModItemRarity.Epic or ModItemRarity.Legendary randomly.

      • getRandomRarityLow

        protected static ModItemRarity getRandomRarityLow()
        Returns:
        ModItemRarity.Common, ModItemRarity.Uncommon, or ModItemRarity.Rare randomly.

      • getBuffs

        public abstract double[] getBuffs()
        Creates a primitive type array of buffs applied to PlayerEntity.
        As each Pet gives different buffs, Pets should not call this method to get a different Pet's buffs.
        Returns:
        primitive type array.
